title: MOOC-Based Blended Science Learning Design: Short-Intensive Course Utilizing Visual Models

context.additional_context: A blended design model combining MOOCs with face-to-face classes in a digital device-based microlearning environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain MOOC-based blended learning structures through visual models
Learners can complete over 80% of science-themed microlearning content in mobile environments
Learners can structure science experiment plans with three or more stages reflecting blended learning design elements
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
